rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Discrimination on the grounds of pregnancy is already illegal. You can find out more here:

https://maternityaction.org.uk/advice/pregnancy-discrimination/
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
